text.tspan: Sanitation facilities usage in rural areas, World
Rural population using the five different levels of sanitation services: safely managed; basic, limited, unimproved
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP) (2024)
